StorageLite.name: StorageLite

params.name: json
params.description: (optional) true if the item should be serialized to a JSON string before being stored

setItem.description:
Stores an item under the specified key. If the key already exists in the
data store, it will be replaced.

clear.description: Removes all items from the data store.

return.description: number of items in the data store

length.description: Returns the number of items in the data store.

params.name: json
params.description: (optional) true if the item is a JSON string and should be parsed before being returned

getItem.description: Returns the item with the specified key, or null if the item was not found.

removeItem.description: Removes the item with the specified key.

storage-lite:ready.description: Fired when the storage interface is loaded and ready for use.

StorageLite.description:
Provides a persistent local key/value data store similar to HTML5's
localStorage.

gallery-storage-lite.description:
Implements a persistent local key/value data store similar to HTML5's
localStorage. Should work in IE5+, Firefox 2+, Safari 3.1+, Chrome 4+, and
Opera 10.5+.
gallery-storage-lite.name: gallery-storage-lite
